thread.title: Buhari submits cabinet list

author: news24.com
title: Buhari submits cabinet list
text:
Abuja - Nigerian President Muhammadu Buhari submitted on Wednesday the names of his nominees for cabinet posts to the senate for approval, the president of the upper house of parliament said.
Senate President Bukola Saraki gave no names of those on the list in a message on Twitter.
Buhari, who on Tuesday said he will control the petroleum ministry, is expected to assign ministerial roles after the names have been approved.
